notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.
ariaRetry: Retry the task. You can improve your previous answer if the author allowed that.
taskDescription: Hajun turns 30 this year and begins to think about retirement. He calculates that he will need $1,200,000 to retire comfortably. He finds a fund to invest in that yields 7.23% and is compounded monthly. How much will Hajun need to invest in the fund when he turns 30 so that he can reach his goal when he retires at age 65?
